reviews.review_msg: No complaints about how Lauren dealt with the course material; all the readings were given their time and she clearly had a good grasp on how to navigate as difficult a subject as genocide through history. Group projects will always be a fine experience or a terrible one depending on your fellow classmates, so just be aware that it's gonna happen.

Amazing professor! Her lectures are clearly organized and easy to understand and follow. She cares deeply about her students and mental health, and even brought snacks for us for lectures. She is kind, very informative, and accessible for extra help. Highly recommend taking class with this professor.

I took her class on Genocide in a Historical Context and she was phenomenal. Her grading was fair, and she was so amazing. She would bring us snacks in order to make the stuff we were talking about a bit easier. She cares so much about her students mental health, especially on such a heavy topic. Will be taking her again!
She is a great professor who is always available for extra help. I would highly recommend taking a class with her, however, you will have to work hard!
